results.title: To repeal the Act entitled "An Act to confer jurisdiction on the State of Iowa over offenses committed by or against Indians on the Sac and Fox Indian Reservation".
results.short_title: To repeal the Act entitled "An Act to confer jurisdiction on the State of Iowa over offenses committed by or against Indians on the Sac and Fox Indian Reservation".
results.latest_major_action: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 199.
results.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) This bill repeals the act entitled "An Act to confer jurisdiction on the State of Iowa over offenses committed by or against Indians on the Sac and Fox Indian Reservation."
results.summary_short: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) This bill repeals the act entitled "An Act to confer jurisdiction on the State of Iowa over offenses committed by or against Indians on the Sac and Fox Indian Reservation."

actions.description: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 199.
Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 115-279.
Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Indian, Insular and Alaska Native Affairs.
Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
